tweet: I'm Timothy Luce, and I'm building a castle. It is an open project, so come check us out, and share something.
We need a structural engineer for our project.  We are building a castle. http://thecastleproject.net
Backhoe? Who needs a backhoe. I dug this with a shovel in my teeth cuz I'm hardcore.  http://yfrog.com/5hgynj
Ditch = almost dug. Meter base & conduit = bought Next up: repair the hydraulic hose that broke on the backhoe, so we can finish the ditch
